Package roulette

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AmericanRoulette
    Implementation of the RouletteGame class using the layout and rules of an american roulette game.
    Dealer
    Dealer class operates an instance of RouletteGame by spinning it, calculating the winnings and paying them out the players as well as making the announcements.
    EuropeanRoulette
    Implementation of the RouletteGame class using the layout and rules of a european roulette game.
    InputHelper
    Helper class (static methods) to input the bets by players
    NormalPlayer  
    Player  
    RouletteDriver
    Shows an example of how to use our library
    RouletteGame
    Abstract class that defines a RouletteGame and holds its players, and other useful variables.
    VIP
